title: Sales Executive Job at Recruit with Adenike
content:
Recruit with Adenike is a recruitment and talent solutions brand committed to connecting high-performing professionals with forward-thinking organizations across diverse industries. From entry-level roles to executive placements, we help businesses attract, engage, and retain the right talent to fuel growth and success. Our approach is efficient, personalized, and rooted in a deep understanding of people and business needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive
Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Sales Executive will be responsible for driving user adoption of our digital financial products—including E-wallets, cards, and other payment solutions—and for acquiring new customers in the designated region.
	This role requires developing and executing strategies to increase transaction volume and product utilization, while building strong client relationships to ensure sustained growth.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop a deep understanding of the company’s products and confidently communicate their advantages to customers.
	Research and identify new business opportunities, including new markets, growth areas, trends, customers, partnerships, and channels.
	Conduct face-to-face meetings with customers and clients.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with both new and existing customers.
	Set goals and develop detailed plans for business and revenue growth.
	Work strategically, including planning and executing initiatives for strong market penetration.
	Discuss and implement promotional strategies and activities; provide feedback on daily experiences and challenges, and suggest solutions.
	Be familiar with the assigned region of operation to effectively drive sales and adoption.
	Manage the sales process from initial contact to final closure.


Job Requirements


	Education: NCE, ND, HND, or B.Sc. in Business Administration, Marketing, or related fields.
	Experience:
	Minimum 1–2 years of experience as a Business Development Executive, ideally in Merchant Acquiring, banking sales, or direct sales in a commercial bank.
	Entry-level candidates with strong sales drive will also be considered.
	Proven track record in sales or business development, especially driving adoption of financial products.
	Strong communication and presentation skills.
	Excellent marketing, engagement, and negotiation skills.
	Knowledge of or familiarity with the Lagos Island market is an added advantage


Compensation Package


	Salary: N70,000 (Gross Monthly)
	Commission: Up to N135,000 (Gross Monthly)
	Transport Allowance
	Health Maintenance Organization (HMO)
	Pension Plan


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitmentforce.africa@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Managing Director Job at Highland Integrated Electricity Services Limited
content:
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    

Highland Integrated Electricity Services Limited (HIESL) is an Investment Holding Company with significant interest in the Electricity Distribution business in Nigeria. The Company is the core investor/majority shareholder in Jos Electricity Distribution (JED Plc). As part of its strategic objectives, the Company is positioned to make investments in the Power Sector and provide Consultancy Services for Power-Related Transactions. Highland Integrated Electricity Services (HIESL) is a privately-owned company with a Board of Directors that ensures proper oversight over key investments especially JED Plc to deliver stakeholder value. Accordingly, it continuously reviews the performance of JED Plc and other investments and formulates strategic plans to be implemented by JED Plc Board and Management. The Board is supported by the Executive Management Team that oversees the day-to-day running and implementation of the board decisions in line with the organization's core values, vision, and mission.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managing Director

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The MD/CE will lead the development and implementation of relevant structures (processes, People, and systems) to support the achievement of the Discos' vision, goals, and strategic objectives.
	The MD shall be responsible for the overall success of the Company, measured by the achievement of the financial goals, Innovation, customer connection, and efficiency, among others.
	The candidate is also expected to collaborate with relevant stakeholders in meeting the Discos' regulatory obligations.


Requirements
The suitable candidate is required to possess the following qualifications:


	First Degree equivalent.
	Minimum of 15 years of work experience with at least 4 years in a similar role 
	Professional Qualification will be an added advantage.
	Knowledge of business principles, operations, and transformation experience.
	Knowledge of utility sector operations and the Nigerian Electricity Supply Industry is a key requirement.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV and Cover Letter only to: info@highland.com.ng using "Managing Director" as the subject of the email.

A hard copy of the application should be submitted to: 
The Managing Director,
Highland Integrated Electricity Services Limited,
24, Thaba Taoka Bluetoothing,
Wuse 2,
Abuja (FCT).

Note

title: Procurement Officer Job at Max Drive
content:
Max Drive - We are a team of passionate people and a leading technology-enabled company driven by a vision to solve the mobility challenges in Africa. We want to get people and goods to their destinations hitch-free. It is personal for us because we understand the frustration of epileptic transportation. We are making mobility safe, affordable, accessible, and sustainable through the deployment of high-performance technologies and operators.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employmwnt Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking to hire a detail-oriented, thorough, and organized Procurement Officer who will be responsible for evaluating suppliers, products, and services, negotiating contracts, and ensuring that approved purchases are cost-efficient and of high quality.


What You’ll Do


	Create RFQs and POs on the ERP platform (Odoo).
	Communicate Purchase Order with vendors to determine terms and availability of goods/services.
	Track pending orders assigned to vendors.
	Track vendor payment with the Account unit.
	Carryout supplier’s core competence assessment and evaluate performance.
	Track delivery of imported orders with the clearing agent.
	Generate and analyze spend reports as may be required.
	Carry out other Procurement/Supply Chain functions that may be assigned.
	Prepare reports on purchases, including cost analyses
	Source for better and alternative cost to what is currently being gotten from existing vendors.
	Negotiate vendor's quote.
	Vendor management.
	Monitor stock levels and place orders as needed
	Make professional decisions in a fast-paced environment.


What You’ll Need


	Bachelor’s degree
	Minimum of 2+ years of working experience
	Experience in the Procurement/Supply Chain space.
	Experience in Importation will be an added advantage.
	Hands-on experience with purchasing software (e.g.Odoo)
	Understanding of supply chain procedures
	Solid analytical skills, with the ability to create financial reports and conduct cost analyses
	Negotiation skills
	Strong communication and negotiation skills.
	Good analytical and strategic thinking skills.


Benefits


	Competitive Pay
	Opportunity for Learning and Development
	Hybrid work structure
	Insurance.

title: Digital Marketing Strategist Job at JAAD Hospital Needs Limited
content:
JAAD Hospital Needs Limited is the sole representative of 365Healthcare UK LTD in West Africa; manufacturers of industry-leading hospital consumables. We are dedicated to providing the highest level of service and value through 365healthcare range of medical and surgical products.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Strategist

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos (Hybrid work environment)
Employment Type: Part-time (2/3days)

Who we need
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking to add a talented Digital Marketing Strategist with a “can do” attitude to join our dynamic, growing, and passionate team.
	This is a full-time role.


The responsibilities will include


	Manage business or corporate paid campaigns across a variety of platforms
	Define relevant social media KPIs, measure, and analyze ongoing progress for future optimizations.
	Oversee social media content development, including ideation, creation, social copywriting, content calendar management, and publishing of social-first content.
	Create and manage social media ads to maximize impact and minimize costs.
	Work with multi-media designers to ensure content is informative, engaging, and entertaining.
	Strong understanding of social paid media to ensure content is timely, engaging, and targeted to the relevant audience.
	Stay up to date with the latest social media best practices, partners, trends, tools, and technology
	Help teams implement changes effectively
	Oversee multiple client projects, ensuring timely delivery, budget adherence, and high client satisfaction.
	Help build a productive environment where team members ‘own’ the product and enjoy working on it
	Helping the product owner and development team to achieve customer satisfaction
	Perform other tasks as assigned.


What you bring
We are looking for a Digital Marketing Strategist with the following experience and skills:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or related fields
	3 years of experience in Marketing, Social Media Marketing and Social Media Content Creation
	Expertise in media platforms (i.e. Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube) and website development tools.
	Proficient in writing, content creation and editing for digital marketing platforms and printed materials.
	Proven ability to develop and execute social media strategies in fast-paced environments.
	Actively provide support by executing various marketing campaigns across digital channels, including digital flyers and promotional activities, ensuring timely and accurate deployment.
	Passion for digital marketing, event planning, and community engagement.
	Effective Communication skills
	Strong organizational and time management abilities
	Experience with social media analytics tools
	Passion for healthcare and knowledge of the healthcare industry is a plus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume along with a portfolio, in any format that best showcases your skills and expertise to: info@jaad365healthcare.com using “Digital Marketing Strategist” as the subject of the email.

What happens next:


	Once we receive your application (resume and portfolio), our hiring team will review it and invite shortlisted candidates for an interview.
